author: bspach
body: IMO, a glaring omission from ISE has always been basic line/word wrap functionality.  Notepad has it, can we get this in ISE, as well?

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Unfortunately, the ISE is not a part of this GitHub project. Feel free to file a suggestion on the UserVoice forum for the ISE: https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell/category/148050-ise-and-tooling

comments.author: pcgeek86
comments.body:
